mapper.sql: a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.id AS "id", a.ri_date AS "riDate", a.today_remark AS "todayRemark", a.tomorrow_plan AS "tomorrowPlan" ,u.name as "createBy.name"
join sys_user u on u.id = a.create_by left join bg_daily_contacter d on d.hid = a.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bg_daily( create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remarks, id, ri_date, today_remark, tomorrow_plan ) VALUES ( #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks}, #{id}, #{riDate}, #{todayRemark}, #{tomorrowPlan} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bg_daily SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, ri_date = #{riDate}, today_remark = #{todayRemark}, tomorrow_plan = #{tomorrowPlan} WHERE id = #{id}
